permissions.name: DescribeInstances
permissions.description: Allows listing of EC2 instances.

permissions.name: ListBucket
permissions.description: Allows listing of objects within an S3 bucket.

permissions.name: GetObject
permissions.description: Allows retrieval of objects from an S3 bucket.

permissions.name: ListRoles
permissions.description: Allows listing of IAM roles.

permissions.name: AssumeRole
permissions.description: Allows assuming an IAM role.

permissions.name: CreateDetector
permissions.description: Allows creation of GuardDuty detectors.

permissions.name: DeleteDetector
permissions.description: Allows deletion of GuardDuty detectors.

permissions.name: ListDetectors
permissions.description: Allows listing of GuardDuty detectors.

permissions.name: UpdateDetector
permissions.description: Allows updating GuardDuty detector settings.

permissions.name: GetFindings
permissions.description: Allows retrieval of GuardDuty findings.

permissions.name: ListFindings
permissions.description: Allows listing of GuardDuty findings.

permissions.name: CreateIPSet
permissions.description: Allows creation of IP sets in GuardDuty.

permissions.name: DeleteIPSet
permissions.description: Allows deletion of IP sets in GuardDuty.

permissions.name: UpdateIPSet
permissions.description: Allows updating of IP sets in GuardDuty.

permissions.name: CreateThreatIntelSet
permissions.description: Allows creation of threat intelligence sets in GuardDuty.

permissions.name: DeleteThreatIntelSet
permissions.description: Allows deletion of threat intelligence sets in GuardDuty.

permissions.name: UpdateThreatIntelSet
permissions.description: Allows updating of threat intelligence sets in GuardDuty.

permissions.name: CreateFunction
permissions.description: Allows creation of Lambda functions for persistence and lateral movement.

permissions.name: UpdateFunctionCode
permissions.description: Allows modification of existing Lambda functions.

permissions.name: CreateAccessKey
permissions.description: Allows creation of new IAM access keys for persistence.

permissions.name: GetFederationToken
permissions.description: Allows creation of temporary credentials that survive key deletion.

permissions.name: SendCommand
permissions.description: Allows remote command execution on EC2 instances.

permissions.name: StopLogging
permissions.description: Allows disabling of CloudTrail logging.

permissions.name: UpdateTrail
permissions.description: Allows modification of CloudTrail settings.

permissions.name: GetAuthorizationToken
permissions.description: Allows retrieval of ECR authentication token.

permissions.name: BatchGetImage
permissions.description: Allows retrieval of container images from ECR.

permissions.name: PutImage
permissions.description: Allows pushing container images to ECR.

permissions.name: InitiateLayerUpload
permissions.description: Allows starting an image layer upload.

permissions.name: UploadLayerPart
permissions.description: Allows uploading image layer parts.

permissions.name: CompleteLayerUpload
permissions.description: Allows completing an image layer upload.

permissions.name: ModifyInstanceAttribute
permissions.description: Allows modification of EC2 instance attributes including user data.

permissions.name: StopInstances
permissions.description: Allows stopping EC2 instances.

permissions.name: StartInstances
permissions.description: Allows starting EC2 instances.

permissions.name: CreateHostedZone
permissions.description: Allows creation of Route53 hosted zones, including private zones that can override AWS API endpoints.

permissions.name: ChangeResourceRecordSets
permissions.description: Allows modification of DNS records within Route53 hosted zones.

permissions.name: IssueCertificate
permissions.description: Allows issuing certificates from a private certificate authority.

permissions.name: GetCertificate
permissions.description: Allows retrieval of certificates issued by a private certificate authority.
